Question: Shenzhen Icpro Technology co.,ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen KingSpec Electronics Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: Gaming Storage and Memory Card

- Showcased at CES 2024
- Consumer-grade and industrial-grade storage and memory solutions
- Strategic collaboration with Xi'an EXA TECH Co., Ltd.
- DDR4 RGB-Silver X for budget-friendly PC setup
- Portable Solid State Drive Series Discount Month on AliExpress
- Product capacity and quality control emphasized
- Latest gaming storage and memory solutions exhibited at CES 2024 booth 52172
- Industrial applications in automation, transportation, AIoT, surveillance, medical, and financing sectors

For more information, visit www.kingspec.com.
